class.name: PIXI.CanvasMaskManager
class.help: A set of functions used to handle masking.

public.name: popMask
public.help: Restores the current drawing context to the state it was before the mask was applied.

parameters.name: renderSession
parameters.help: The renderSession whose context will be used for this mask manager.

public.name: pushMask
public.help: This method adds it to the current stack of masks.

parameters.name: maskData
parameters.help: the maskData that will be pushed

parameters.name: renderSession
parameters.help: The renderSession whose context will be used for this mask manager.
